head.title: No Alcohol, but a Sweet Little Buzz

hedline.hl1: No Alcohol, but a Sweet Little Buzz

block.p: A sophisticated nonalcoholic quaff is always welcome. Twelve is just such a refreshing newcomer, a fizzy tea-based drink seasoned with herbs, citrus and ginger and only a modest amount of sweetener.

It comes in a translucent 750-milliliter wine-style bottle and is classy over ice in a stem goblet. Adding a splash of vodka or dark rum and a wedge of orange gives it another dimension. Twelve makes a delectable partner for ripe melon -- with ham early in the meal, or without for dessert.
